- Added Sposify Fix 0.0.6, which should fix it from crashing when opening settings.

First AltStore release!
 Crashes when opening Settings, not recommended to use.

 https://github.com/SpotCompiled/SpotC-Plus-Plus/releases/tag/v1.1.1

apps.localizedDescription:
EeveeSpotify is a Spotify IOS app tweak that removes ads, removes limited skips, and almost every other premium feature. It even allows you to fetch lyrics from third-party APIs bypassing Spotify's monthly limit! The only main premium feature that does not work is offline downloads, as this is done server-side.

 Sposify is a Spotify IOS app tweak that adds various enhancements to the Spotify IOS application.

 More Info:
 https://github.com/SpotCompiled/SpotC-Plus-Plus

 We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with any other company, agency or government agency. All product and company names are trademarksâ„¢ or registeredÂ® trademarks of their respective holders. Use of them does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by them.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you use Spotify with bluetooth accessories requiring always on.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you use Spotify with bluetooth peripherals.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you identify through FaceID
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This lets you share HealthKit data to provide personalised audio for your workouts.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This lets you use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This lets you use Spotify with location-based features.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This lets you use your data to deliver personalized ads or content to you.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
privacy.NSPhotosUsageDescription: This lets you save and select images to and from your Photo Library.
privacy.NSMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSBluetoothUsageDescription: This lets you use Spotify with external accessories.
privacy.NSNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSFaceidUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: Used to control your tempo for Spotify Running.

permissions.usageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.

apps.localizedDescription:
EeveeSpotify is a Spotify IOS app tweak that removes ads, removes limited skips, and enables almost every other premium feature. It even allows you to fetch lyrics from third-party APIs bypassing Spotify's monthly limit! The only main premium feature that does not work is offline downloads, as this is done server-side.

 More Info:
 https://github.com/SpotCompiled/SpotveeC

 We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with any other company, agency or government agency. All product and company names are trademarksâ„¢ or registeredÂ® trademarks of their respective holders. Use of them does not imply any affiliation with or endorsement by them.
